questions.question: Considering the overall visual structure, what is the primary function of this rectangular item, judging by its textual content and organization?

Disregarding the numerical data, what is the term used in the label to denote the total number of units the package contains?
Examining the textual sections, what specific part of the human body does the label's data pertain to, relevant to the product's consumption?
What is the visual style applied to the main numerical data, such as calories and fat content, emphasizing their significance?
What is the textual element, besides “Nutrition,” used as the primary title at the top of this product label?

What is the type of information presented in terms of percentages, indicating relative proportions of different nutritional components?
What is the visual element used as a separator between textual content and numerical data, typical in tabulated information?
Regarding the arrangement of the data, what type of format is predominantly used to structure the nutritional facts, typical in food labeling?
What is the type of textual information shown, describing the overall dietary contribution of the listed ingredients?
